first_evidence.name: First Clue
first_evidence.description: Find your first piece of crucial evidence.

lore_master.name: Lore Master
lore_master.description: Unlock your first full story backstory in the journal.

historian.name: Historian
historian.description: Unlock 5 story backstories in the journal.

magnetic_personality.name: Magnetic Personality
magnetic_personality.description: Bring the MRI hazard to its final state.

vacuum_wrestler.name: Vacuum Wrestler
vacuum_wrestler.description: Successfully disable the robo-vacuum by grabbing it.

coroners_office_key.name: Coroner's Office Key
coroners_office_key.description: A small, ornate key. 'Lakeview Hospital - Do Not Copy' is etched on the side.
coroners_office_key.examine_details: The ornate design suggests it's for an important room. This key must be for Bludworth's office; finding what's inside feels critical.

radiology_key_card.name: Radiology Key Card
radiology_key_card.examine_details: Grants access to restricted areas in the hospital's radiology wing and can activate certain equipment.

bludworths_house_key.name: Bludworth's House Key
bludworths_house_key.description: A tarnished brass key labeled 'Bludworth Residence'.
bludworths_house_key.examine_details: A tarnished brass key labeled 'Bludworth Residence'.

bludworths_final_notes.name: Bludworth's Final Notes
bludworths_final_notes.description: A sheaf of hastily scribbled notes by William Bludworth, detailing his final, desperate theories on disrupting Death's design and the potential cost. Some passages are circled, others violently crossed out.
bludworths_final_notes.examine_details: The notes are increasingly frantic as they progress, showing Bludworth's growing desperation to find a way to cheat Death. References to 'the Corman method' and 'lake confrontation' appear repeatedly. His final entry mentions that time is running out - for everyone.

desk_drawer_key.name: Desk Drawer Key
desk_drawer_key.description: A small, ornate key with a customized skull-shaped hilt. 'Hope River Hospital - Do Not Copy' is etched on the side.
desk_drawer_key.examine_details: This key looks custom-made. It's likely for a specific piece of furniture, probably the large desk in the Coroner's Office.

scalpel.name: Scalpel
scalpel.description: A small, sterile scalpel. Stewart Tubbs survived the Mornington Crescent explosion but he was mistakenly pronounced dead after chemical bottles broke and created a gas that rendered him unconscious; he was later autopsied alive by his co-worker.
scalpel.examine_details: An extremely old scalpel, rusted or covered in.. some other grime. Despite its old appearance, it still looks menacingly sharp.

can_of_hice_pale_ale.name: Can of Hice Pale Ale
can_of_hice_pale_ale.description: A can of cheap Hice Pale Ale. Carter Daniels was drinking this shortly before he was dragged by his tow truck and then obliterated in the ensuing explosion.
can_of_hice_pale_ale.examine_details: The beer can is dented and empty. The label promises refreshment, but delivered only death.

hairpin.name: Hairpin
hairpin.description: A simple hairpin, used for picking locks. Louise King survived the train crash with her twin Danny but was later attacked and survived alongside him.
hairpin.examine_details: A standard metal hairpin. It looks like it could be useful for more than just hair.

rubber_band.name: Rubber Band
rubber_band.description: A broken rubber band, snapped with force. Candice Hooper, a gymnast, survived the bridge collapse but died during practice when a series of unfortunate events led to her landing badly, snapping her spine.
rubber_band.examine_details: The rubber band is snapped cleanly in half, much like the gymnast's spine.

detective_badge.name: Detective Badge
detective_badge.description: A gold detective's badge. Warren Ackerman survived the casino elevator crash but was later electrocuted by damaged cables while pursuing a suspect.
detective_badge.examine_details: A gold-plated detective's badge. The name 'W. Ackerman' is engraved on it.

sunglasses.name: Sunglasses
sunglasses.description: A pair of broken sunglasses. Jake, Carly's arrogant party-hard boyfriend... was later shredded by helicopter blades.
sunglasses.examine_details: A pair of stylish sunglasses. One of the lenses is missing and the frame is bent.

drumstick.name: Drumstick
drumstick.description: A drumstick belonging to Jamie. He survived the Club Kitty collapse but later died after being shot in the chest while saving Eric.
drumstick.examine_details: A standard wooden drumstick, scuffed from use. It feels unnaturally heavy in your hand.

toy_pigeon.name: Toy Pigeon
toy_pigeon.description: A piece of evidence related to a past victim.
toy_pigeon.examine_details: A small, battered toy pigeon. Tim Carpenter, survived the Route 23 pile-up only to be crushed by falling plate glass window at the dentist. Tim was warned to watch for pigeons just before his death

unlucky_coin.name: (Un)Lucky Coin
unlucky_coin.description: A half dollar, covered in what might be dried blood. Associated with Hunt Wynorski's death by internal organ suction removal by a pool filtration system after he lost this coin.
unlucky_coin.examine_details: The coin is stained with something dark and crusted. Definitely not lucky for its previous owner.

bloodied_lawn_mower_spark_plug.name: Bloodied Lawn Mower Spark Plug
bloodied_lawn_mower_spark_plug.description: A spark plug from a lawnmower, coated in blood and grime. Howard Campbell, Iris's son, received an extremely deep exfoliating facial from a lawnmower during a family barbecue.
bloodied_lawn_mower_spark_plug.examine_details: The spark plug is covered in dried blood and bits of... other things you'd rather not identify.

temporary_tattoo_Sheet.name: Temporary Tattoo Sheet
temporary_tattoo_Sheet.description: A sheet of cheap, glittery temporary tattoos, one partially used. Mandy... was later electrocuted in a hotel hot tub...
temporary_tattoo_Sheet.examine_details: A sheet of temporary tattoos with glittery dolphin and flower designs. One is missing.

metal_sculpture_piece.name: Metal Sculpture Piece
metal_sculpture_piece.description: A small, sharp piece from a metal sculpture. Officer Amy Tom survived a near-fatal encounter but later bled to death after being impaled by her own art.
metal_sculpture_piece.examine_details: A twisted piece of metal, sharp as a knife. It looks like it was broken off a larger sculpture.

miniature_toy_bus.name: Miniature Toy Bus
miniature_toy_bus.description: A piece of evidence related to a past victim.
miniature_toy_bus.examine_details: A small, miniature model of a city bus. Terry Chaney was fatally struck by a bus moments after telling Carter off.

display_skeleton_piece.name: Display Skeleton Piece
display_skeleton_piece.description: A small, plastic piece from a medical display skeleton. Katie... was later impaled on the ribs of a medical display skeleton.
display_skeleton_piece.examine_details: A plastic rib bone from a life-sized anatomical skeleton.

hair_clip.name: Hair Clip
hair_clip.description: A simple, slightly singed hair clip. Samantha Lane died at a salon when a rock, propelled by a lawnmower, perforated her eye shortly after the speedway disaster. She had moments before put tampons in her children's ears to block the noise at the track.
hair_clip.examine_details: The hair clip is singed around the edges, possibly from the heat of the salon equipment.

costume_feather.name: Costume Feather
costume_feather.description: A single feather from a stage costume. Shawna Engels survived the casino elevator crash but was later... impaled... by a coin dispenser.
costume_feather.examine_details: A long, bright pink feather, likely from a showgirl's costume.

charred_mug.name: Charred Mug
charred_mug.description: A piece of evidence related to a past victim.
charred_mug.examine_details: A ceramic mug, blackened and cracked by intense heat. Ms. Lewton died in a house fire triggered by a series of 'accidents' involving her computer monitor and vodka.

defibrillator_pads.name: defibrillator pads
defibrillator_pads.description: A pair of defibrillator pads, still sealed in their sterile packaging. They look like they connect to a larger machine.
defibrillator_pads.examine_details: These pads are meant to deliver a powerful electrical shock to restart a heart. They're useless without the main defibrillator unit, but the conductive gel and metal contacts might have other applications.

nail_gun.name: Nail Gun
nail_gun.description: A heavy-duty nail gun, capable of driving nails with dangerous force. It can be loaded with a strip of nails and used as a tool or weapon.
nail_gun.examine_details: The nail gun is currently {state}. Handle with care‚Äîmisfires can be deadly.

fireworks_wrapper.name: Fireworks Wrapper
fireworks_wrapper.description: A piece of a colorful fireworks wrapper. Matt, Amanda's relaxed boyfriend... was later incinerated by fireworks.
fireworks_wrapper.examine_details: The colorful paper wrapper from a large firework. It smells of gunpowder.

bloody_piece_of_metal.name: Bloody Piece of Metal
bloody_piece_of_metal.description: A piece of evidence related to a past victim.
bloody_piece_of_metal.examine_details: A jagged piece of metal, stained dark brown. Billy Hitchcock was decapitated by shrapnel from a train wreck after Alex intervened and saved Carter Horton from an oncoming train.

glass_shard.name: Glass Shard
glass_shard.description: A sharp shard of glass. Gino, the smart one... was later impaled through the mouth by a glass shard.
glass_shard.examine_details: A wicked-looking shard of thick glass. The edges are incredibly sharp.

floral_hair_decoration.name: Floral Hair Decoration
floral_hair_decoration.description: A floral hair decoration. Rinoka Aratsu survived the train crash (despite a vision of her death) but was severely burned and later crushed by an overflowing bathtub.
floral_hair_decoration.examine_details: A silk flower meant to be worn in the hair. The petals are singed at the edges.

carly_hagans_notebook.name: Carly Hagan's Notebook
carly_hagans_notebook.description: A small notebook filled with notes and theories about Death. Carly Hagan... was supposedly the last to die, vanishing into thin air.
carly_hagans_notebook.examine_details: The notebook is filled with frantic sketches, names, and theories about Death's design. The last page is blank.

movie_ticket_stub.name: Movie Ticket Stub
movie_ticket_stub.description: A ticket stub for 'Love Lays Dying in 3D'. Janet Cunningham survived the speedway crash but died after being run over by an 18-wheeler that crashed into the coffee shop she was in.
movie_ticket_stub.examine_details: The ticket is for a 3D movie about death. How ironic.

male_wedding_band.name: Male Wedding Band
male_wedding_band.description: A plain wedding band. Tom survived the casino elevator crash but was later hit by a speeding truck while changing a tire.
male_wedding_band.examine_details: A plain tungsten wedding band. It feels heavier than it looks.

surf_wax_black.name: Surf Wax (Black)
surf_wax_black.description: A chunk of black surf wax, smelling faintly of coconut and something metallic... like blood. Ravyn survived the beach plane crash but was later impaled by her own surfboard...
surf_wax_black.examine_details: A block of black surf wax, used for grip. It has a strange, coppery smell underneath the coconut scent.

work_gloves.name: Work Gloves
work_gloves.description: A piece of evidence related to a past victim.
work_gloves.examine_details: A pair of worn leather work gloves. Brian Gibbons survived the Lakeview apartment fire, as well as a run in with a news van on his family's farm, but was later incinerated by an exploding barbecue grill.

rubber_ducky.name: Rubber Ducky
rubber_ducky.description: A small, yellow rubber ducky. A female factory worker survived the explosion... only to be electrocuted in her bathtub.
rubber_ducky.examine_details: A classic yellow rubber ducky. It squeaks when you squeeze it.

medical_director_key_card.name: Medical Director Key Card
medical_director_key_card.description: A master key card for Lakeview Hospital. Bears the insignia of the Medical Director.
medical_director_key_card.examine_details: This master key card grants access to almost all secure areas on this level. It seems very powerful. The card is pristine white with gold lettering and an official hospital seal. This level of access is reserved for only the highest-ranking medical staff.

dirty_hair_tie.name: Dirty Hair Tie
dirty_hair_tie.description: A piece of evidence related to a past victim.
dirty_hair_tie.examine_details: A blue hair tie speckled with brown..or dark red? Nora Carpenter survived the Route 23 pile-up but was decapitated by a malfunctioning elevator.

bottle_of_water.name: bottle of water
bottle_of_water.description: A plastic bottle partially filled with clear water.
bottle_of_water.examine_details: It's a standard plastic water bottle, about half full. The water looks clean enough to drink, or perhaps use for other purposes.

splintered_log_piece_stefani.name: Splintered Log Piece (Stefani)
splintered_log_piece_stefani.description: A heavy, splintered piece of wood, smelling of pine and recent trauma. Stefani Reyes, who inherited her grandmother's sensitivity to Death's design, was crushed by falling logs from a derailed train.
splintered_log_piece_stefani.examine_details: The wood splinter is sharp and jagged, with the fresh scent of pine mixed with something more ominous.

chablis_cat_toy.name: 'Chablis''s Cat Toy
chablis_cat_toy.description: A small, fluffy cat toy. Ruby 'Chablis' survived the yacht foundering but later died from cyanide gas exposure, biting off her tongue.
chablis_cat_toy.examine_details: A small toy mouse with a bell inside. It's covered in catnip.

old_patient_chart.name: Old Patient Chart
old_patient_chart.description: A yellowed medical chart with faded handwriting and coffee stains.
old_patient_chart.examine_details: The chart contains medical information from years past. Some entries mention unusual accident patterns and 'anomalous death circumstances' in the margins. Several names are highlighted, and there are notes about 'intervention attempts' and 'design failures'.

clove_cigarette.name: Clove Cigarette
clove_cigarette.description: A piece of evidence related to a past victim.
clove_cigarette.examine_details: A half-smoked clove cigarette, the distinctive sweet smell still lingering. Kat Jennings survived the Route 23 pile-up but was killed when an airbag deployed, impaling her head on a pipe protruding through the headrest.

press_pass.name: Press Pass
press_pass.description: A laminated press pass for 'Borderlands Patrol'. Patricia 'Patti' Fuller survived the train bombing but later died of an intentional overdose of anesthesia, though she was revived.
press_pass.examine_details: A laminated press pass. The photo shows a determined-looking woman named Patricia Fuller.

compact_mirror.name: Compact Mirror
compact_mirror.description: A small makeup compact. Rosemarie 'Rose' Dupree survived the yacht foundering but later had (most of) her internal organs pumped out during liposuction.
compact_mirror.examine_details: A fancy makeup compact with a mirror. Some of the powder is loose inside.

lawnmower_blade_piece.name: Lawnmower Blade Piece
lawnmower_blade_piece.description: A jagged piece of a metal blade. Another factory worker... was later killed when his legs were shredded by his own lawnmower.
lawnmower_blade_piece.examine_details: A broken piece of a lawnmower blade, rusted and stained with something that looks like grass... and blood.

demolition_derby_ticket_stub.name: Demolition Derby Ticket Stub
demolition_derby_ticket_stub.description: A soggy ticket stub from a demolition derby event. Hal Ward survived the train bombing but later drowned during a flash-flood.
demolition_derby_ticket_stub.examine_details: A water-logged ticket stub for a demolition derby. The date and time are illegible.

charred_vintage_earrings.name: Charred Vintage Earrings
charred_vintage_earrings.description: A pair of elegant earrings from the late 1960s, warped and partially melted by intense heat. Evie Bludworth would have burned to death in the Skyview Tower explosion premonition, and still wound up burning to death.
charred_vintage_earrings.examine_details: The earrings are twisted and blackened by extreme heat, their original beauty destroyed by flame.

photo_of_officer_burke.name: Photo of Officer Burke
photo_of_officer_burke.description: A piece of evidence related to a past victim.
photo_of_officer_burke.examine_details: A photo of Officer Thomas Burke. Survived the Route 23 pile-up. Rumored to have met a grisly end involving a wood chipper much later.

locket.name: Locket
locket.description: A small, tarnished locket. Juliet Collins survived the Mornington Crescent explosion but later drowned after being thrown into the River Thames, though she was revived.
locket.examine_details: A small, heart-shaped silver locket, tarnished with age. It refuses to open.

pool_ball_keychain.name: Pool Ball Keychain
pool_ball_keychain.description: A piece of evidence related to a past victim.
pool_ball_keychain.examine_details: An orange striped pool ball keychain. Eugene Dix survived the pile-up but died in a really implausible hospital oxygen explosion along with Clear Rivers.

crowbar.name: Crowbar
crowbar.description: A sturdy steel crowbar. Good for prying or as a makeshift weapon.
crowbar.examine_details: It's a heavy steel crowbar, about two feet long. One end is flattened and split for prying, the other is pointed. It feels substantial in your hands.

damaged_prom_corsage.name: Damaged Prom Corsage
damaged_prom_corsage.description: A prom corsage, its flowers crushed and petals torn, with a faint scent of train oil. Charlie Reyes was killed alongside his sister Stefani by falling logs on the way to his senior prom, moments after they thought they had cheated Death another time.
damaged_prom_corsage.examine_details: The corsage is completely ruined, its flowers crushed and stained with what looks like oil... or blood.

overexposed_photo_of_kevin.name: Overexposed Photo of Kevin
overexposed_photo_of_kevin.description: An overexposed photo showing Kevin Fischer. He survived the Devil's Flight coaster crash, helped Wendy, but died later in a subway crash.
overexposed_photo_of_kevin.examine_details: The overexposure makes Kevin's face appear ghostly and pale, as if he's already dead.

rubber_gloves.name: rubber gloves
rubber_gloves.description: Thick, insulated rubber gloves. Might offer protection from electricity.
rubber_gloves.examine_details: Heavy-duty rubber gloves rated for electrical work. The faded label claims protection up to 1000 volts, though you're not sure how much you trust that rating. They look reasonably intact with no visible tears.

camera.name: Camera
camera.description: An early 2000's digital camera, lens cracked. Wendy Christensen used this camera, capturing photos that predicted the deaths of the Devil's Flight coaster survivors.
camera.examine_details: The camera's LCD screen is cracked, but you can still make out some disturbing images stored in its memory. Photos of carnival rides and people who look... doomed.

mud_flap_girl_necklace.name: Mud Flap Girl Necklace
mud_flap_girl_necklace.description: A chrome necklace of a mud flap girl silhouette almost as cheap as the person who wore it. Won by Franklin Cheeks; he avoided the Devil's Flight coaster crash, but was killed in a drive-thru when a multi-car accident found its way into his backseat, burying a radiator fan in his skull. Couldn't have happened to a better guy.
mud_flap_girl_necklace.examine_details: The chrome is tarnished and the design is tacky. There's a small dent that might be from impact damage.

photo_of_kimberly_corman.name: Photo of Kimberly Corman
photo_of_kimberly_corman.description: A piece of evidence related to a past victim.
photo_of_kimberly_corman.examine_details: A photo of Kimberly Corman. She had the premonition of the Route 23 pile-up and saved a group of people who started dying immediately afterwards. Survived after confronting Death at the lake. She is one of the only people to have found a successful escape from Death. This is who you need to find!!

dreenas_necklace.name: Dreena's Necklace
dreenas_necklace.description: A broken necklace. Dreena... later had her neck snapped in a bridge collapse alongside Jeremy.
dreenas_necklace.examine_details: A silver necklace with a small charm, snapped in the middle.

flask.name: Flask
flask.description: A small hip flask. Ben survived the Club Kitty collapse but later died after falling down an open manhole.
flask.examine_details: A stainless steel hip flask, dented on one side. It's empty, but smells faintly of cheap whiskey.

propeller_blade.name: Propeller Blade
propeller_blade.description: A jagged piece of metal from a boat propeller. Kris... was the first of the Spring Break survivors to die... eviscerated by a boat propeller.
propeller_blade.examine_details: The bent and broken tip of a boat's propeller blade. It's stained with something dark and oily.

skeleton_figurine.name: Skeleton Figurine
skeleton_figurine.description: A small plastic skeleton figurine from a hotel desk. Mary-Beth Bradbury survived the train crash but was later brutally decapitated by a flailing chainsaw.
skeleton_figurine.examine_details: A cheap, plastic skeleton figurine, the kind you might find in a gift shop. Its smile is unnerving.

chardonnay_lighter.name: 'Chardonnay''s Lighter
chardonnay_lighter.description: A well-used lighter. Darla 'Chardonnay' survived the yacht foundering but later drowned in her hottub after being knocked unconscious by the lid falling on her.
chardonnay_lighter.examine_details: A cheap, disposable lighter. It's almost out of fluid.

rusty_fishing_hook.name: Rusty Fishing Hook
rusty_fishing_hook.description: A large, rusty fishing hook, barbed and bent. Karl... later... fell onto a gaff hook that pierced his eye and skull.
rusty_fishing_hook.examine_details: A large, rusty gaff hook. The point is still sharp despite the rust.

torn_vest_fragment.name: Torn Sanitation Worker Vest Fragment
torn_vest_fragment.description: A bright orange sanitation worker's vest, stained and smelling faintly of refuse. Julia Campbell, Howard's daughter, was crushed to death inside a garbage truck.
torn_vest_fragment.examine_details: The vest fragment is torn and stained, with an unpleasant smell that seems to cling to it.

white_rose.name: White Rose
white_rose.description: A piece of evidence related to a past victim.
white_rose.examine_details: A pressed white rose. Isabella Hudson survived the Route 23 pile-up because she was actually never supposed to die. She was an example of Death using a red herring to keep survivors busy as it cleaned up.

small_football_trophy.name: Small Football Trophy
small_football_trophy.description: A small, tarnished football trophy. Jack Curtis foresaw 'John Doe's' murder spree based on the five senses, prevented it, and survived the subsequent attempts on his life, only to be shot to death by a jealous police officer. Truly a shame to have lost this one; he could have been a lot of help.
small_football_trophy.examine_details: A small trophy of a football player. The plaque on the base is blank.

hospital_directory_pamphlet.name: Hospital Directory Pamphlet
hospital_directory_pamphlet.description: A tri-fold pamphlet showing the layout of Hope River Hospital.
hospital_directory_pamphlet.examine_details:
A glossy pamphlet, slightly worn. It details the hospital layout:

[b]LEVEL 1 (Ground Floor):[/b]
  - Emergency Entrance & Waiting Room
  - Main North Wing (Chapel, Gift Shop, Cafeteria Access)
  - Radiology Wing (X-Ray, [color=ff0000]MRI Suite[/color])
  - Morgue & Coroner's Office (via Stairwell)

[b]LEVEL 2 (Upper Floors):[/b]
  - [color=ff0000]Intensive Care Unit (ICU)[/color]
  - Surgical Wing
  - Cardiology Wing

This gives you a much clearer idea of where everything is.

bone_saw.name: Bone Saw
bone_saw.description: A visceral-looking bone saw, stained with something dark.
bone_saw.examine_details: A visceral-looking bone saw, stained with something dark.

sherrys_cellphone.name: Sherry's Cellphone
sherrys_cellphone.description: A cellphone with the name 'DEATH' on the 'recent calls' caller ID. Stephanie 'Sherry' Pulaski survived the yacht foundering but was later run over by a bus after a phone call from Death distracted her.
sherrys_cellphone.examine_details: An older model cellphone. The screen is cracked, but the last call log is chillingly clear: 'DEATH'.

strip_of_nails.name: Strip of Nails
strip_of_nails.description: A strip of collated nails, some missing, faint blood traces. Erin Ulmer survived the Devil's Flight coaster crash, but died after her hand was nailed to her face through the back of her head at the hardware store.
strip_of_nails.examine_details: Some of the nails are missing from the strip, and there are dark stains that look suspiciously like dried blood.

earbud.name: Earbud
earbud.description: A single earbud. Joshua Cornell III, the representative of hearing, survived multiple attempts on his life in his home, but later had his head cut off by a platinum record.
earbud.examine_details: A single white earbud. The wire has been cleanly severed.

first_aid_kit.name: first aid kit
first_aid_kit.description: A standard wall-mounted first aid kit. Contains basic medical supplies.
first_aid_kit.examine_details: A wall-mounted first aid kit, filled with some exceptional wound care.

chefs_knife.name: Chef's Knife
chefs_knife.description: A sharp chef's knife, surprisingly clean. Dennis Lapman, Sam's boss, survived the bridge collapse but was later killed by a wrench propelled through his head, an accident triggered by Roy Carson's death.
chefs_knife.examine_details: The knife is pristine and sharp, unlike the messy death of its associated victim.

photo_of_lewis_from_ring_the_bell_game.name: Photo of Lewis from Ring-The-Bell Game
photo_of_lewis_from_ring_the_bell_game.description: A photo of Lewis Romero hitting the bell at a strength tester game. He survived the Devil's Flight coaster crash, but had his head crushed by weights at the gym.
photo_of_lewis_from_ring_the_bell_game.examine_details: Lewis looks proud and strong in the photo, flexing as he rings the bell. Ironic, considering how he died.

photo_of_ian_with_banners.name: Photo of Ian with Banners
photo_of_ian_with_banners.description: A photo of Ian McKinley standing near banners that foreshadowed his death. He survived the Devil's Flight coaster crash, but was crushed by a falling cherry picker sign.
photo_of_ian_with_banners.examine_details: Looking at this photo, you can see warning signs everywhere - literally. The banners around Ian seem to predict his doom.

detective_notepad.name: Detective Notepad
detective_notepad.description: A small police notepad. Detective Isabelle Montoya survived the casino elevator crash but later died from being drenched in contaminated blood...
detective_notepad.examine_details: A small, spiral-bound notepad. The last page has some hastily scrawled notes about 'unusual circumstances'.

ink_pen.name: Ink Pen
ink_pen.description: A heavy fountain pen, stained with ink. Matthew Upton survived the Mornington Crescent explosion but was later impaled in the stomach by a chemical-coated pipe.
ink_pen.examine_details: An expensive-looking fountain pen. It has leaked dark blue ink into its cap.

gammy_death_book.name: Gammy's Death Book
gammy_death_book.description: A leather-bound book filled with chilling handwritten notes, sketches of omens, and names. Iris Campbell, who disrupted Death's design in 1968, was documenting its patterns before being fatally impaled through the mouth by a weather vane.
gammy_death_book.examine_details: The book contains detailed notes about Death's design, with disturbing sketches and a growing list of names. Many entries are written in urgent, shaky handwriting.

charlie_delgado_car_keys.name: Charlie Delgado's Car Keys
charlie_delgado_car_keys.description: A set of car keys. Charlie Delgado survived the Club Kitty collapse but was later crushed when an elevator fell on him.
charlie_delgado_car_keys.examine_details: A single car key on a simple ring. The logo on the key is for a vintage muscle car.

female_wedding_band.name: Female Wedding Band
female_wedding_band.description: A plain wedding band. Allie Gaines survived the casino elevator crash but later died from being drenched in contaminated blood...
female_wedding_band.examine_details: A simple gold wedding band. There's a small inscription on the inside, but it's too small to read.

cracked_rv_side_mirror.name: Cracked RV Side Mirror
cracked_rv_side_mirror.description: A cracked side mirror from an RV, reflecting a distorted image. Darlene Campbell, Stefani's mother, was bisected/smashed (hard to tell in the aftermath tbh) by a falling lamp post after their RV crashed during an attempt to get inside Iris' home.
cracked_rv_side_mirror.examine_details: The mirror is spider-webbed with cracks, creating a distorted reflection that's somehow fitting.

teenagers_dropped_phone.name: Teenager's Dropped Phone
teenagers_dropped_phone.description: A smartphone with a cracked screen. The lock screen shows a frantic, half-finished text message: 'MOM I SAW IT ALL THE BULLS THE FIRE EVERY'.
teenagers_dropped_phone.examine_details: The phone's battery is nearly dead. The last message is a desperate warning. There are smudges of dirt and what might be blood on the case.

syringe.name: syringe
syringe.description: A sterile, disposable syringe with a fine needle, still in its packaging.
syringe.examine_details: The syringe is new and appears to be medical grade. The needle is capped for safety. It could be used to inject something... or someone. The packaging indicates it's a 10ml capacity.

photo_of_amber.name: Photo of Amber
photo_of_amber.description: A photo of Amber Regan. Briefly thought to have survived the Devil's Flight coaster premonition. Current status unknown.
photo_of_amber.examine_details: Amber's fate remains a mystery. The photo offers no clues about what happened to her.

morgue_key_card.name: Morgue Key Card
morgue_key_card.examine_details: Used by hospital staff to access the morgue and related areas. Has a magnetic strip on the back. The card shows signs of frequent use, with slightly worn edges and a few scratches on the magnetic strip.

ukelele_string.name: Ukulele String
ukelele_string.description: A snapped ukulele string. Drew... was later strangled when her scarf got caught in the gears of a sugar cane harvester...
ukelele_string.examine_details: A single, snapped nylon ukulele string. It's surprisingly strong.

painkillers.name: painkillers
painkillers.description: A small bottle of generic painkillers.
painkillers.examine_details: A plastic bottle of over-the-counter pain-relief pills. The label shows it's ibuprofen, 200mg tablets. Might help take the edge off minor injuries and pain.

photo_of_the_ashleys.name: Photo of the Ashleys
photo_of_the_ashleys.description: A photo showing Ashley Freund and Ashlyn Halperin at a carnival game. They survived the coaster but were burned alive in malfunctioning tanning beds (though some say they almost made it out and got electrocuted instead).
photo_of_the_ashleys.examine_details: The two girls look happy and carefree in the photo, unaware of the horrible fate that awaited them.

bill_sangster_knife.name: Bill Sangster's Knife
bill_sangster_knife.description: A sharp, well-maintained knife. Bill Sangster had a complicated history; he survived the Mornington Crescent explosion, was inside the gears of a drawbridge when it was raised -crushing him as he was pursuing Juliet Collins-, and it was revealed that he was London's own Jack the Ripper.
bill_sangster_knife.examine_details: A well-cared-for pocket knife. The blade is sharp enough to shave with.

broken_train_handhold.name: Broken Train Handhold
broken_train_handhold.description: A piece of a broken handhold from the train. James Barker survived the train crash but later seemingly died after being flung into a department store and impaled by umbrellas.
broken_train_handhold.examine_details: A piece of hard plastic from a train's overhead handhold, snapped in two.

storage_room_key.name: Storage Room Key
storage_room_key.description: A small brass key labeled 'Storage Room'.
storage_room_key.examine_details: This key looks like it opens a storage room somewhere in the hospital. The brass has a dull patina, suggesting it's been used frequently. Small scratches around the keyhole indicate regular use.

attic_key.name: Attic Key
attic_key.description: A small, tarnished brass key labeled 'Attic'.
attic_key.examine_details: An old, simple key. The label is slightly faded but readable.

skateboard_wheel.name: Skateboard Wheel
skateboard_wheel.description: A single skateboard wheel, cracked and gritty with sand. Bobby... later fell from a hotel balcony, landing on decorative spiked railings below...
skateboard_wheel.examine_details: A skateboard wheel, heavily worn and cracked down the middle. It's covered in sand and grime.

safety_goggles.name: Safety Goggles
safety_goggles.description: A pair of cracked safety goggles, typical for auto work. Andy Kewzer, who worked at an auto shop, survived the speedway crash only to be launched through a chain-link fence by a flying CO2 tank.
safety_goggles.examine_details: The goggles are cracked and scratched from heavy use. They didn't provide much safety in the end.

photo_of_perry.name: Photo of Perry
photo_of_perry.description: A photo of Perry Malinowski. Survived the Devil's Flight coaster premonition but was impaled by a flagpole at the tricentennial celebration.
photo_of_perry.examine_details: Perry looks happy and relaxed in the photo, completely unaware of the deadly flagpole in his future.

navel_piercing_with_crystal.name: Navel Piercing with Crystal
navel_piercing_with_crystal.description: A small navel piercing with a dangling crystal. Belonged to Carrie Dreyer, would-be independent woman, who died in the Devil's Flight roller coaster crash.
navel_piercing_with_crystal.examine_details: The crystal catches the light ominously, and there's a small amount of dried blood on the metal.

newspaper_clipping_about_flight_180.name: Newspaper Clipping about Flight 180
newspaper_clipping_about_flight_180.description: A piece of evidence related to a past victim.
newspaper_clipping_about_flight_180.examine_details: A newspaper clipping detailing the Flight 180 disaster and the subsequent deaths of the survivors. Clear Rivers, a survivor of Flight 180, died trying to help the Route 23 survivors.

miniature_garbage_truck.name: Miniature Garbage Truck
miniature_garbage_truck.description: A small toy garbage truck. Dawson Donahue, the representative of smell, survived but was later crushed against a wall when his car exploded.
miniature_garbage_truck.examine_details: A die-cast metal toy garbage truck. The paint is chipped in several places.

patient_wristband.name: Patient Wristband
patient_wristband.description: A hospital patient wristband. Andrew Williams was a patient in the hospital whose overflowing bathtub broke through the hospital floor and crushed Rinoka Aratsu beneath it.
patient_wristband.examine_details: A plastic hospital wristband. The name 'Andrew Williams' is faded but legible.

suicide_note.name: Suicide Note
suicide_note.description: A crumpled piece of paper, a suicide note. It details the visions of a tormented narrator...
suicide_note.examine_details: The note is written in a frantic, almost illegible hand. It speaks of inescapable visions and a final, desperate act.

swimsuit_piece.name: Swimsuit Piece
swimsuit_piece.description: A small piece of swimsuit fabric. Amanda... became increasingly paranoid... and was later trapped and drowned in a pool.
swimsuit_piece.examine_details: A small scrap of floral-patterned swimsuit fabric.

scuffed_dress_shoe.name: Scuffed Dress Shoe
scuffed_dress_shoe.description: A single, scuffed men's dress shoe from the 1960s, its sole nearly detached. Chet was foreseen to fall to his death in the Skyview Tower elevator shaft.
scuffed_dress_shoe.examine_details: The shoe is heavily scuffed and the sole is hanging by a thread, much like its owner's life was.

security_guard_flashlight.name: Security Guard Flashlight
security_guard_flashlight.description: A heavy-duty security guard's flashlight, its lens cracked. George Lanter, a security guard and one of the survivors, was later fatally struck by a speeding ambulance.
security_guard_flashlight.examine_details: The flashlight is heavy and well-built, but the cracked lens renders it nearly useless.

turquoise_charm.name: Turquoise Charm
turquoise_charm.description: A small turquoise charm. Bodil Raden survived the train crash but later seemingly died after being flung into a department store and impaled by umbrellas.
turquoise_charm.examine_details: A small, polished turquoise stone on a broken chain. It's cold to the touch.

brooch.name: Brooch
brooch.description: An ornate silver brooch. Jane Stanley survived the Mornington Crescent explosion but was later bitten on the tongue by a poisonous cobra.
brooch.examine_details: An antique silver brooch in the shape of a serpent. The pin on the back is slightly bent.

airplane_ticket_paris.name: Airplane Ticket (Paris)
airplane_ticket_paris.description: An airplane ticket for Vol√©e Airlines Flight 180 to Paris. Sam Lawton, Molly Harper, Peter Friedkin, and Nathan Sears all survived the North Bay Bridge collapse, only to tragically die when this flight exploded shortly after takeoff, prequeling the events of the first film.
airplane_ticket_paris.examine_details: The ticket is for Flight 180 - the same flight from the original disaster. Death came full circle.
airplane_ticket_paris.character_connection: Sam Lawton, Molly Harper, Peter Friedkin, Nathan Sears

military_dog_tag.name: Military Dog Tag
military_dog_tag.description: A dented military dog tag. Corbin Wainright... His fate... is unknown, but this suggests he may not have been so lucky either.
military_dog_tag.examine_details: A standard issue military dog tag. The name 'Corbin Wainright' is clearly stamped on it, along with other service details.

business_card.name: Business Card
business_card.description: A glossy business card for a talent agent. Al Kinsey survived the train bombing but was later beheaded by a dislodged hubcap.
business_card.examine_details: A slick business card for 'Al Kinsey, Talent Management'. There's a small, dark stain on one corner.

crushed_beer_can.name: Crushed Beer Can
crushed_beer_can.description: A crushed aluminum beer can. Corey... was later crushed by a falling vending machine...
crushed_beer_can.examine_details: An aluminum beer can, crushed almost flat.

construction_pin.name: Construction Pin
construction_pin.description: A metal pin shaped like a miniature hard hat. Zack Halloran survived the train bombing but was later vertically severed in half by a falling glass pane.
construction_pin.examine_details: A small lapel pin in the shape of a yellow hard hat. It's surprisingly heavy.

basement_key.name: Basement Key
basement_key.description: A heavy iron key labeled 'Basement'. Feels cold to the touch.
basement_key.examine_details: A standard, sturdy-looking key. The label is clear and deeply etched. It should unlock the basement entrance. The metal feels unnaturally cold, as if it's been sitting in a freezer.

shattered_light_bulb.name: Shattered Light Bulb
shattered_light_bulb.description: A piece of evidence related to a past victim.
shattered_light_bulb.examine_details: Fragments of a large industrial light bulb, like from a neon sign. Carter Horton was crushed by a falling sign after surviving Flight 180.

eyedrops.name: Eyedrops
eyedrops.description: A small bottle of eyedrops. Chelsea Cox, the representative of sight, survived but was later impaled through the eyes by icicles.
eyedrops.examine_details: A small plastic bottle of eyedrops. It's about half full.

prize_ribbon.name: Prize Ribbon
prize_ribbon.description: A large, blue ribbon awarded for 'Best in Show'. It has a small metal clasp.
prize_ribbon.examine_details: The ribbon is slightly frayed at the edges. The clasp is tarnished but still functional.

compact.name: Compact
compact.description: A small makeup compact. Amber survived the Club Kitty collapse but was later smeared into a makeshift parking brake by Charlie's out of control car.
compact.examine_details: A silver makeup compact. The mirror inside is cracked.

shiraz_edelstein_braid.name: 'Shiraz' Edelstein's Braid
shiraz_edelstein_braid.description: A single, stylish braided hair extension. Shirelle 'Shiraz' Edelstein survived the yacht foundering but was later internally decapitated on the set of a music video after her hair got caught in the spokes of a spinning prop car's tire.
shiraz_edelstein_braid.examine_details: A long, tightly woven hair extension. There's a dark stain near one end.

cigarette_lighter.name: Cigarette Lighter
cigarette_lighter.description: A heavy cigarette lighter. Sebastian Lebecque survived the Club Kitty collapse but was killed when his motorcycle exploded from a thrown-away cigar.
cigarette_lighter.examine_details: A weighty, chrome-plated cigarette lighter. It still sparks when you flick it.

small_mirror.name: Small Mirror
small_mirror.description: A small handheld mirror. William 'Brut' Simms survived the yacht foundering and being swept away in a sewer flood, but was later run over when he was left suspended by his belt in a subway tunnel.
small_mirror.examine_details: A small, pocket-sized mirror. Your reflection looks distorted and pale.

septum_ring.name: Septum Ring
septum_ring.description: A delicate body piercing, violently snapped from its home and bloodied. Erik Campbell's piercings were torn from his body by a malfunctioning MRI machine, leading to his impalement by a wheelchair.
septum_ring.examine_details: The ring is bent and has dried blood on it. It was clearly torn out with great force.

blurry_photo.name: Blurry Photo
blurry_photo.description: A strip of four photos from a booth. The final picture is horribly distorted, showing what looks like a bull's horn, screaming faces, and fire.
blurry_photo.examine_details: The photos are faded and the last one is almost unrecognizable. The images seem to hint at something terrible.

used_syringe.name: Used syringe
used_syringe.description: A used syringe. Kate Shelley had visions related to Death's design after surviving a Sux Racing incident at her college, and subsequently became a servant of Death; she ultimately died by suicide via syringe. Dont poke yourself!
used_syringe.examine_details: A used syringe, its needle still attached. It's a biohazard and deeply unsettling.

spanish_phrasebook.name: Spanish Phrasebook
spanish_phrasebook.description: A small, well-worn Spanish phrasebook. Bryan, a tough but calm college student... was later suffocated inside a trapped coffin.
spanish_phrasebook.examine_details: A pocket Spanish phrasebook. The page for 'Help me' is bookmarked.

cobra_totem.name: Cobra Totem
cobra_totem.description: A small wooden totem carved in the shape of a cobra. Andrew Caine survived the Mornington Crescent explosion but was later blinded and bitten repeatedly by cobras.
cobra_totem.examine_details: A hand-carved wooden cobra, coiled as if ready to strike. The craftsmanship is unsettling.

retractable_clothesline_piece.name: Retractable Clothesline Piece
retractable_clothesline_piece.description: A piece of evidence related to a past victim.
retractable_clothesline_piece.examine_details: A piece of white, retractable clothesline, slightly frayed. Tod Waggner accidentally hanged himself with one after surviving Flight 180.

bridge_piece.name: Bridge Piece
bridge_piece.description: A small, splintered piece of wood from a bridge. Jeremy... later had his neck snapped in a bridge collapse.
bridge_piece.examine_details: A splinter of wood, smelling of creosote and salt. It looks like it came from a wooden bridge.

camera_lens_cap.name: Camera Lens Cap
camera_lens_cap.description: A plastic camera lens cap. Gunter Nonhoff survived the yacht foundering but was later slowly severed in half by an unattended delivery truck.
camera_lens_cap.examine_details: A standard black plastic lens cap. It has a small scratch on the front.

damaged_police_badge.name: Damaged Police Badge
damaged_police_badge.description: A police detective's badge, dented and bearing a bullet hole. Agent Jim Block was investigating the bridge survivors when he was shot in the back and killed by a paranoid Peter Friedkin.
damaged_police_badge.examine_details: The badge is dented and has a small, round hole punched through it. The metal is tarnished around the bullet hole.

broken_ivory_piano_key.name: Broken Ivory Piano Key
broken_ivory_piano_key.description: A broken ivory piano key, with a tiny, faded fingerprint. A young guest, Penny, was envisioned to be crushed by a falling piano during the Skyview Tower disaster, and still wound up being run over by a piano moving truck.
broken_ivory_piano_key.examine_details: The piano key is cracked down the middle, and you can see a small fingerprint - probably from a child.

photo_of_julie_giving_the_finger.name: Photo of Julie Giving the Finger
photo_of_julie_giving_the_finger.description: A photo of Julie Christensen giving the finger. Wendy's sister, she survived the Devil's Flight coaster premonition, but coincidentally she died with her sister, and friend, Kevin, in a subway crash months after.
photo_of_julie_giving_the_finger.examine_details: Julie's defiant gesture in the photo seems to be aimed at Death itself. Unfortunately, Death had the last laugh.

accupuncture_needle.name: Accupuncture Needle
accupuncture_needle.description: A thick, long metal needle used for accupuncture, slightly bent. Isaac Palmer survived the bridge collapse but had his head crushed by a falling Buddha statue in a local spa after a fire started.
accupuncture_needle.examine_details: The needle is bent at an odd angle and has a dark stain near the tip.

corkscrew.name: Corkscrew
corkscrew.description: A small corkscrew. Jack Cohen, a 99-year-old man, survived the train crash but later died after falling on a corkscrew that impaled his eye.
corkscrew.examine_details: A simple waiter's corkscrew. The tip is alarmingly sharp.

candy_wrapper.name: Candy Wrapper
candy_wrapper.description: The wrapper of some peanut butter cups, boasting, 'Now More Nuts!', which you turn over and see is smeared with blood. Bobby Campbell, Erik's brother, was impaled through the forehead by a vending machine dispensing spring.
candy_wrapper.examine_details: The wrapper's cheerful advertising contrasts horrifically with the blood stains on the back.

small_microphone.name: Small Microphone
small_microphone.description: A small, lapel microphone. Katie Astin, the representative of touch, survived but was later blinded and impaled by a lighting rig.
small_microphone.examine_details: A tiny lapel microphone with a small clip. The foam cover is missing.

bent_meat_skewer.name: Bent Meat Skewer
bent_meat_skewer.description: A long, heavy-duty meat skewer, bent and bloodied. Peter Friedkin, driven mad by Death's design, was impaled through the back by Sam Lawton with this skewer from Le Caf√© Miro 81's kitchen.
bent_meat_skewer.examine_details: The skewer is bent at a sharp angle and has dried blood along its length.

fuzzy_red_dice.name: Fuzzy Red Dice
fuzzy_red_dice.description: A piece of evidence related to a past victim.
fuzzy_red_dice.examine_details: A pair of fuzzy red dice, like those Rory Peters hung in his car. He survived the Route 23 pile-up but was sliced apart by barbed wire fencing after Kat's accident.

magnifying_glass.name: Magnifying Glass
magnifying_glass.description: A small, portable magnifying glass. Hector Barnes survived the Mornington Crescent explosion but was later bitten on the wrist by a poisonous cobra.
magnifying_glass.examine_details: A simple magnifying glass with a plastic handle. The lens is smudged.

baseball_bat.name: wooden baseball bat
baseball_bat.description: A solid wooden baseball bat, well-used but sturdy.
baseball_bat.examine_details: It's a standard wooden baseball bat, about 32 inches long. The wood is worn smooth from use, and it feels balanced in your hands.

photo_of_jason_on_devils_flight.name: Photo of Jason on Devil's Flight
photo_of_jason_on_devils_flight.description: A photo of Jason Wise posing in front of the Devil's Flight roller coaster; the tram of cars caught in time blurring into frame looks as though it's about to bury itself in his head. He died in the initial crash.
photo_of_jason_on_devils_flight.examine_details: The timing of this photo is chilling - it almost looks like the coaster cars are about to crash into Jason's head in the image.

womans_shoe.name: Woman's Shoe
womans_shoe.description: A single woman's tennis shoe, one of the laces badly frayed. Lori Milligan, Nick's girlfriend, died a horrific death, internally decapitated by being crushed between a pillar and a truck.
womans_shoe.examine_details: The shoe is worn and the lace is frayed almost to the breaking point, just like its owner's life.

tattered_book.name: Tattered Book
tattered_book.description: A worn copy of 'Murder on the Orient Express'. Peter Hoffman survived the train crash but later died after being impaled through his torso by the horns of a gazelle.
tattered_book.examine_details: A paperback copy of 'Murder on the Orient Express'. The pages are dog-eared and stained.

officer_hewlett_badge.name: Officer Hewlett's Badge
officer_hewlett_badge.description: A police officer's badge. Officer Marina Hewlett survived the Club Kitty collapse (that she unknowingly helped happen) but later died after being bitten by a black widow.
officer_hewlett_badge.examine_details: A tarnished police badge. The name 'M. Hewlett' is engraved below the seal.

bent_elevator_call_button.name: Bent Elevator Call Button
bent_elevator_call_button.description: A brass elevator call button, characteristic of 1960s architecture, severely dented. Mr. Fuller was premonitioned to be crushed in the Skyview Tower's elevator, and still wound up being crushed.
bent_elevator_call_button.examine_details: The brass button is severely dented, as if crushed by enormous pressure.

bandages.name: bandages
bandages.description: A roll of sterile medical bandages.
bandages.examine_details: A standard roll of gauze bandages in sterile packaging. The medical-grade material is soft yet durable, perfect for treating minor to moderate wounds.

seashell_necklace_fragment.name: Seashell Necklace Fragment
seashell_necklace_fragment.description: Part of a broken seashell necklace, sharp edges stained dark. Kim... was later decapitated by a boat propeller...
seashell_necklace_fragment.examine_details: A few small seashells still strung on a broken cord. One of the shells is cracked and has a dark stain.

wrench.name: Wrench
wrench.description: A small, greasy wrench. Susan Fries survived the train bombing but later had her chest incinerated by thermite.
wrench.examine_details: A small adjustable wrench, covered in a thin layer of grease.

bicycle_brake_handle.name: Bicycle Brake Handle
bicycle_brake_handle.description: A severely damaged handbrake (usually) found on mountain bikes. Danny King survived a train crash after a premonition but was later accidentally killed by his sister being unknowingly used as a servant of Death.
bicycle_brake_handle.examine_details: The metal of the brake handle is bent and twisted, as if from a powerful impact.

macys_name_tag.name: Macy's Name Tag
macys_name_tag.description: A 'Club Kitty' name tag. Macy survived the club collapse but was later sliced (mostly) in half by a fallen metal pane.
macys_name_tag.examine_details: A plastic name tag for 'Club Kitty'. The name 'Macy' is printed on it, slightly smeared.

ipod.name: iPod
ipod.description: An iPod with white earphones. Aldis Escobar survived a near-fatal casino elevator incident, but his ribcage was later crushed by his steering wheel in a car crash that same afternoon.
ipod.examine_details: An old model iPod. The screen is cracked and it won't turn on.

metal_spike.name: Metal Spike
metal_spike.description: A long metal spike, like from an industrial machine. Roy Carson was impaled by a hook through the chin at the factory where he worked after Death came for Nathan. Nathan took Roy's remaining time, which, unfortunately, was not much longer than Nathan already had.
metal_spike.examine_details: The spike is long and sharp, with what looks like dried blood on the pointed end.

circuit_city_name_tag.name: Circuit City Name Tag
circuit_city_name_tag.description: A plastic name tag with the Circuit City logo. Will Sax survived the train bombing but was later decapitated by a flying CD.
circuit_city_name_tag.examine_details: A vintage Circuit City name tag. The name 'Will' is printed on it.

tacky_souvenir_tshirt.name: Tacky Souvenir T-Shirt
tacky_souvenir_tshirt.description: A brightly colored, tacky tourist t-shirt ('I Got Leid in Hawaii!'), ripped and burned. Brett... was later incinerated when a propane tank for a luau barbecue exploded.
tacky_souvenir_tshirt.examine_details: A singed and torn souvenir t-shirt. The garish print is partially blackened by soot.

train_ticket.name: Train Ticket
train_ticket.description: A creased train ticket stub. The fourth factory worker... was later run over by a speeding train while fleeing.
train_ticket.examine_details: A ticket for a commuter train. The destination is McKinley Central.

bloody_arm_cast.name: Bloody Arm Cast
bloody_arm_cast.description: A section of a fiberglass arm cast, stained with dried blood. Nick O'Bannon, who had the premonition of the speedway disaster, ultimately had his head smashed into a wall by a semi crashing into a coffee shop.
bloody_arm_cast.examine_details: The cast is cracked and stained with dark blood. A grim reminder of the injuries that preceded death.

binocular_flask.name: Binocular Flask
binocular_flask.description: A pair of seemingly ordinary binoculars that cleverly conceals a flask. Nadia Monroy had taken this from Hunt Wynorski before she was gruesomely decapitated by a tire that flew out of the speedway.
binocular_flask.examine_details: A clever drinking device disguised as binoculars. The flask compartment still smells of alcohol.

pair_of_glasses.name: Pair of Glasses
pair_of_glasses.description: A black framed pair of glasses, one lens shattered. Olivia Castle survived the North Bay Bridge collapse but, after a mishap during laser eye surgery, fell from a high-rise window, her other eye graphically popping out upon impact with a car windshield below.
pair_of_glasses.examine_details: One lens is completely shattered, creating a spider web of cracks. Fitting, considering what happened to the wearer's eye.

picket_fence_splinter.name: Picket Fence Splinter
picket_fence_splinter.description: A sharp splinter of wood, possibly from a picket fence. One of the factory workers heeded the narrator's warning... but later died.
picket_fence_splinter.examine_details: A large, sharp splinter of white-painted wood. It's stained dark at the tip.

poker_chip.name: Poker Chip
poker_chip.description: A well-worn poker chip. Arlen Ploog survived the casino elevator crash, but had his penis bitten off by a startled prostitute and succumbed to blood loss.
poker_chip.examine_details: A heavy clay poker chip from a high-stakes casino. The edges are worn smooth.

nipple_ring.name: Nipple Ring
nipple_ring.description: A piece of evidence related to a past victim.
nipple_ring.examine_details: A cheap metal nipple ring. Evan Lewis survived the Route 23 pile-up, then died after a fire escape ladder impaled his eye.

wine_bottle_stopper.name: Wine Bottle Stopper
wine_bottle_stopper.description: An ornate wine bottle stopper. Dominique Swann, the representative of taste, survived but later died of asphyxiation on a glass shard from an exploding bottle.
wine_bottle_stopper.examine_details: An ornate, heavy wine bottle stopper made of metal and cork.

car_keys.name: Car Keys
car_keys.description:
A set of car keys.
Charlie Delgado survived the Club Kitty collapse. While trying to help Jess, Charlie finds himself in a security building where Eric had previously sabotaged an elevator.
Believing it to be working, he steps backward into the open shaft without looking and plunges ten feet to the ground before the broken elevator car falls on top of him, crushing him.
car_keys.examine_details: A single car key on a simple ring. The logo on the key is for a vintage muscle car.

surfboard_fin.name: Surfboard Fin
surfboard_fin.description:
A metal-tipped surfboard fin, bent and stained.
Eric survived the Club Kitty collapse but was fatally impaled by a surfer's metal tipped board after falling from the Santa Monica Pier.
surfboard_fin.examine_details: The fin is sharp and slightly bent, with a dark stain near the tip. It looks like it was torn from a surfboard by a violent impact.

cowboy_hat.name: Cowboy Hat
cowboy_hat.description: A slightly crushed cowboy hat. Jonathan Groves, the 'Cowboy', was killed when a hospital bathtub fell through the ceiling and crushed him in his room below.
cowboy_hat.examine_details: The hat is crushed and dusty, probably from the building collapse that killed its owner.

confederate_flag_patch.name: Confederate Flag Patch
confederate_flag_patch.description: A small, dirty Confederate flag patch, possibly torn from a piece of clothing. Cynthia Daniels, married to the racist Carter, was bisected by the hood of a race car at the speedway.
confederate_flag_patch.examine_details: The patch is torn and dirty, reflecting the ugliness of the ideology it represents.

horseshoe_ornament.name: Horseshoe Ornament
horseshoe_ornament.description: A tarnished metal horseshoe ornament, bent out of shape. Carter Daniels had one hanging from his rearview mirror before his tow truck exploded.
horseshoe_ornament.examine_details: The horseshoe is supposed to bring good luck, but this one is bent and tarnished. Clearly didn't work.

bloody_brick.name: Bloody Brick
bloody_brick.description: A piece of evidence related to a past victim.
bloody_brick.examine_details: A dirty brick, one corner covered with dried blood, hair and chunks of gore. Writing scratched into it reads: 'Alex B. - Didn't see it coming.' Well, shit. ..if HE didn't make it...

loose_brick.name: loose brick
loose_brick.description: A brick that feels loose in the fireplace cavity. It's heavy and rough.
loose_brick.examine_details: This brick is definitely not set properly. It's covered in soot and bits of old mortar. Something about it seems... significant. There are dark stains that look like they might be more than just soot.
